name: Van Wizards vs The Mageocracy (Early Access)
name_original: Van Wizards vs The Mageocracy (Early Access)
description:
In a world of structure and rules, the only reprieve is the road. 

The Way of the Van. No Masters. No Gods. Just some groovy vibes and magic pies. This is the life of Van Wizards. 

A life on the move, a life in which existing is an act of rebellion.. 

Van Wizards vs The Mageocracy is Powered by Fate! It's a game where you play a titular Van Wizard and travel across the country with your group, fighting against the Mageocracy and their oppressive rule over the World and all things magic! 

The game is in early access with Layout and Art being worked on by RPG Creator's Catalyst! Purchase of this copy will get you the early access version of the game and discount on the full release, and also the first supplement with notes and advice on running the game and brand new stunts!
